name: the funen bracteate
description: An ancient gold medallion from 5th century Denmark, depicting a warrior with a suebian knot. The runes inscribed around its edge writes houaz la√æu aaduaaaliia a-- and pulse with a faint, otherworldly energy.
history: This bracteate from the island of Funen (Denmark) and over a thousand of its kind were inspired by commemorative gold medallions minted for Roman emperors.
